issue.title: [R] support for decimal128
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3617](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3617). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
implemented as a vctrs record with one complex field so that it has the same layout
